nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
widgets_values: low quality, worst quality, deformed, distorted, disfigured, motion smear, motion artifacts, fused fingers, bad anatomy, weird hand, ugly

Framerate can be adjusted, just make sure you are using the same framerate in your VideoCombine node to see proper playback.

60FPS = Lower quality, more motion
24 FPS = Higher quality, less motion
Best use descriptive prompt, but you can even leave it empty in i2v case.
Depending on the latent upscaler model used, it can increase either spatial or temporal resolution, without moving to/from pixel space.
This flow shows keyframe interpolation, where keyframes are positioned in indices 0, 40 and 90 in 🅛🅣🅧 LTXV Base Sampler.
